column3: Group code
column5: Whether or not detailed requirements are provided

column3: Contents of property
This property indicates the ON/OFF status.
This property indicates the minimum/maximum electric energy for charging in W.
This property indicates the minimum/maximum electric energy for discharging in W.
This property indicates the minimum/maximum current for charging in increments of 0.1A.
This property indicates the minimum/maximum current for discharging in increments of 0.1A.
This property indicates the working operation status.
column4: Rapid charging = 0x41, Charging = 0x42, Discharging = 0x43, Standby = 0x44, Test = 0x45, Other = 0x40

column3: This property indicates the rated electric energy of the battery in Wh.
This property indicates the rated charging capacity of the battery in increments of 0.1Ah.
This property indicates the rated voltage of the battery in volts.
This property indicates the measured instantaneous charge/discharge electric energy in watts (positive/negative).
column4: 0x00000001.0x3B9AC9FF (1. 999,999,999W) : during charging (positive value), 0xFFFFFFFF. 0xC4653601 (-1. -999,999,999W) : during discharging (negative value)

column3: This property indicates the measured instantaneous charge/discharge current in increments of 0.1A (positive/negative).
column4: 0x0001.0x7FFE (0.1.3,276.6A) : during charging (positive value), 0xFFFF-0x8001 (-0.1. -3,276.7A) : during discharging (negative value)

column3: This property indicates the measured instantaneous charge/discharge voltage in volts (positive/negative).
column4: 0x0001.0x7FFE (1.32,766V) : during charging (positive value), 0xFFFF. 0x8001 (-1. -32,767V) : during discharging (negative value)

column3: This property indicates the measured cumulative discharge electric energy in increments of 0.001kWh.

column2: “Measured cumulative discharge electric energy” reset setting
column3: Resets “Measured cumulative discharge electric energy” to zero.
This property indicates the measured cumulative charge electric energy in increments of 0.001kWh.

column2: “Measured cumulative charge electric energy” reset setting
column3: Resets “Measured cumulative charge electric energy” to zero.
Sets the battery to one of the following operation modes: “Rapid charging,” “Charging,” “Discharging,” “Standby,” “Test” or “Others.”
column4: Rapid charging=0x41, Charging=0x42, Discharging=0x43, Standby=0x44, Test=0x45, Others=0x40

column3: This property indicates the status of connection with the current system (system interconnection status).
column4: System interconnection (reverse power flow acceptable) = 0x00, Independent type = 0x01, System-interconnected type (reverse power flow not acceptable) =0x02

column3: This property indicates the minimum and maximum values of charging power battery in watts in the dependent status.
This property indicates the minimum and maximum values of discharging power from the battery in the independent status in watts.
column4: 0x00000000–0x3B9AC9FF (0–999,999,999W) Minimum discharging power: Maximum discharging power

column3: This property indicates the minimum and maximum values of a charging current to the battery in the independent status in units of 0.1A.
This property indicates the minimum and maximum values of a discharging current in the independent status in units of 0.1A.
column4: 0x0000–0x7FFE(0–3,276.6A) Minimum discharging current: Maximum discharging current

column3: Specifies the charge/discharge electric energy in Wh (positive/negative).
Specifies the charging/discharging capacity in increments of 0.1Ah (positive/negative).
This property indicates the remaining stored electric energy in Wh.
This property indicates the remaining capacity in increments of 0.1Ah.
This property indicates the charging rate of the battery in %
This property indicates the battery state of health in %
This property indicates the battery type.
This property specifies the charge electric energy in Wh.
This property specifies the discharge electric energy in Wh.
This property specifies the charging capacity in increments of 0.1Ah.
This property specifies the discharging capacity in increments of 0.1Ah.
This property specifies the charge electric energy in W.
This property specifies the discharge electric energy in W.
This property specifies the charge current in increments of 0.1A.
This property specifies the discharge current in increments of 0.1A.
This property indicates the rated voltage of a battery in the independent status in volts.
